title: An XAI Approach to Deep Learning Models in the Detection of DCIS. (arXiv:2106.14186v2 [eess.IV] UPDATED)
abstract: The results showed that XAI could indeed be used as a proof of concept to begin discussions on the implementation of assistive AI systems within the clinical community.
context:
Title: An XAI Approach to Deep Learning Models in the Detection of DCIS. (arXiv:2106.14186v2 [eess.IV] UPDATED)
Abstract: The results showed that XAI could indeed be used as a proof of concept to begin discussions on the implementation of assistive AI systems within the clinical community.
translated_title: 一种应用XAI方法检测DCIS的深度学习模型
translated_abstract: 结果表明，XAI确实可以作为概念验证的方法，对临床社区内辅助人工智能系统的实施进行讨论。
tldr: 该研究证明了XAI可用于证明辅助人工智能系统的可行性，有效地应用于医疗领域。
en_tdlr: This study demonstrates that XAI can be used to prove the feasibility of assistive AI systems, which can be effectively applied in the medical field.
